full_summary:
# Enterprise Information Management Solutions
## RFI Announcement

### Contract Overview
This request for information (RFI) is a solicitation from the Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat for Enterprise Management Information Solutions. The government is seeking information from potential suppliers to enhance its ability to manage and maintain its enterprise information systems.

### Tender Details
- **RFI Number**: WS4030021148
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4030021148
- **Publication Date**: May 31, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: August 14, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
- **Eligible Segments:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Subject Matter
This RFI seeks information on the following areas:

* Software Solutions
* Data Management and Query Software

### Contracting Entity and End-User
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services
- **End-User Entities**: Treasury Board (TBS)

### Trade Agreements
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- and more...

### Locations
- **Contract Delivery**: Canada
- **Regions of Opportunity**: None specified

### Points of Contact
- **Contracting Officer**: Mario A. Godard (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: [mario.a.godard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mario.a.godard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: None

### Notice and Attachments
- **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16422439](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16422439)
- **Attachments**: None

### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria for this RFI will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Important Notes
All inquiries and responses must be submitted electronically through the notice URL above. The Tender Closing Date is set at August 14, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT. No late submissions will be accepted. Respondents are required to ensure that their submissions are in compliance with the applicable trade agreements. Failure to comply may result in disqualification. Only qualified and interested suppliers should respond. If you wish to respond,
